img.alt: Rene Bibaud's Complete Fundamentals Of Rope Jumping

a.title: Rene Bibaud's Complete Fundamentals Of Rope Jumping

h2.a: Rene Bibaud's Complete Fundamentals Of Rope Jumping

div.p: Rene Bibaud is the holder of the world record for speed rope-jumping, in this intensive programme she takes you through the fundamentals of practising and teaching rope-jumping.

div.p: Seattle-based musician and film maker Robert Millis takes a journey through the Indian state of Tamil Nadu to sample the local culture and musical tradition.
